body: If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't underestimate random people curse. This will put you into overthinking shit. MADAFAKA. Forgive me for I have sinned

那個312每個中翻漫畫下面都要留言是怎樣？
要怎麼檢舉啊

omg, can u please stop to repost the chinese translated yaoi manga？You reupload them in a messy way.When the same manga have a new chapter, you reupload all of them again in every post. You waste the storage of this website and makes everyone feel UNCOMFORTABLE！Stop your reupload please！
你不要再重覆上傳了好嗎？？盜傳也傳得像屎一樣，雜亂無章。亂得一塌糊塗讓我懷疑你腦子是不是有病，根本就在擾亂已經很混亂的搜尋系統和關鍵詞設定，停下好嗎！！！
